column1: Appendix table 7. Number and proportion of all arrests following release that were within or outside the state of release, among prisoners released in 30 states in 2005
Report title: Multistate Criminal History Patterns of Prisoners Released in 30 States, NCJ 248942
Data Source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, Recidivism of State Prisoners Released in 2005 data collection.
Author:(s) Matthew R. Durose, Howard N. Snyder, Ph.D., and Alexia D. Cooper, Ph.D.
Appendix table 7. Number and proportion of all arrests following release that were within or outside the state of release, among prisoners released in 30 states in 2005
Note: Prisoners were tracked for 5 years following release. Number of arrests was rounded to the nearest 1,000. See appendix table 8 for standard errors.
Source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, Recidivism of State Prisoners Released in 2005 data collection.
